Description: Digital PCR (dPCR) has been viewed as a revolutionary technology for precise and accurate absolute quantification. For cancer research, faster, simpler and high-throughput ready dPCR is necessary to support liquid biopsy research efforts. Here, we present data for three multiplex EGFR mutation panels compatible with ctDNA on the automation compatible Applied Biosystems™ QuantStudio™ Absolute Q™ dPCR system. Once upgraded, the Applied Biosystems™ QuantStudio™ Absolute Q™ AutoRun dPCR Suite leverages intelligent automation to allow flexibility to run >960 samples with up to 72 hours of hands-free operation – helping to deliver efficient high-throughput multiplex dPCR with a streamlined walk-away workflow. .
SearchResultBody: ESP06B. Precision Multiplexed ctDNA Quantification Using an Automation-Ready dPCR Solution
Title: Precision Multiplexed ctDNA Quantification Using an Automation-Ready dPCR Solution
